experiment_name: Cofactor Binding Dynamics Influence the Catalytic Activity and Selectivity of an Artificial Metalloenzyme
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:4°C;    reaction_ph:5.0;    reaction_other_conditions:LmrR_X (120 μM), [Cu(phen)(NO3)2] (90 μM), 48h reaction time, prepared in situ by self-assembly;    reaction_substrate_concentration:1 mM 2-methyl-1H-indole, 1 mM 2-methyl-1-(thiazol-2-yl)prop-2-en-1-one
